Name: Dispatcher Login
Description: Provides secure login for dispatchers using the Mastermind Monitoring system.

Name: Incident Tracking
Description: Enables dispatchers to track incidents and their statuses in real-time.

Name: Dealer Account Management
Description: Allows dealers to manage their account details and preferences.

Name: Inventory Control
Description: Manages dealer inventory including stock levels and restocking alerts.

Name: Cross-System Reporting
Description: Generates reports integrating data from business and monitoring systems.

Name: Real-Time Notifications
Description: Sends real-time updates and alerts to users.

Name: Dealer Dashboard
Description: Provides a comprehensive dashboard for dealers to monitor activities.

Name: Sales Tracking
Description: Tracks and reports sales made by dealers.

Name: Dealer Notifications
Description: Sends tailored notifications to dealers about their activities.

Name: Custom Reporting
Description: Allows users to generate custom reports tailored to their needs.

Name: Alarm Prioritization
Description: Ranks alarms by priority for faster dispatcher response.

Name: Billing and Invoicing
Description: Generates bills and invoices for dealer transactions.

Name: Data Synchronization
Description: Ensures real-time data synchronization across systems.

Name: Multi-Tenant Support
Description: Enables the application to support multiple dealer environments.

Name: Theme Customization
Description: Allows users to customize the application theme.

Name: Incident Archiving
Description: Archives resolved incidents for historical reference.

Name: Supplier Coordination
Description: Facilitates coordination between dealers and suppliers.

Name: Service Layer Integration
Description: Facilitates communication between WPF application and the WCF service layer.

Name: User Feedback Module
Description: Collects and analyzes feedback from users to improve services.

Name: Audit Logs
Description: Tracks and logs all user activities for security and auditing purposes.

Name: Dispatcher Notifications
Description: Sends updates to dispatchers about incidents and system statuses.

Name: Advanced Filtering
Description: Offers advanced filtering options for data views and reports.

Name: Cross-System User Management
Description: Allows management of users across business and monitoring systems.

Name: Ad Campaign Analytics
Description: Tracks the performance of ad campaigns run by dealers.

Name: Two-Factor Authentication
Description: Enhances login security with two-factor authentication.

Name: Alarm History
Description: Provides a detailed history of all alarms generated in the system.

Name: Product Catalog
Description: Provides a detailed product catalog for dealers to manage their offerings.

Name: API Management
Description: Manages API calls for seamless integration with other applications.

Name: Customer Query Management
Description: Manages and resolves customer queries efficiently.

Name: Web-Based Analytics
Description: Offers analytics tools to understand trends and performance metrics.
